name: Roast pork with potatoes
instructions: Pre-heat the oven to 240°C. Score the skin of the pork. Place the pork in a tin, together with the vegetables. Place it all in the oven and roast it for 25 minutes. Add half cup of water and continue to be cooked for 1 hour more on 200°C.

name: Traditional dish
instructions: Cut the peppers and tomatoes into pieces. Heat olive oil in a pan. Cook the peppers in the pan about 5 minutes. Add the tomatoes and a dash of salt. Add eggs and cheese and cook the mixture for 5 more minutes.

name: Cake Tasty
instructions: Mix the flour and the sugar. Then add milk and eggs. After all of it is good mixtured, put it in a pan with butter. Bake it for 30 minutes on 200°C. The cake is ready for searving.
